project-1.title: Thinking About Eating Plants
project-1.description: Thinking About Eating Plants uses a combination of user input and limited navigation to curate the user experience. The site seeks to approach misconceptions about plant based diets without judgment, and in a way that aligns with the interests and values of the user. Note: the site is currently hosted on Heroku, which is very slow.
